name: Can't Tax Me
description:
Two things in life are certain… death, and TAXES! …but that doesn’t mean you can’t fight for what’s right! 

Can’t Tax Me was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50. The theme was “Delay the Inevitable”.

Defend your vault from hordes of the jealous King’s tax ghouls and protect what’s rightfully yours! 

Your goal is to reach the highest level, unlock all of the abilities and protect your vault by warding off the king’s cronies for as long as possible!

**Will you be able to reach the end and get your reward?**

Controls ——————————————

Keyboard

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Attack - Left Mouse Click or CTRL on Keyboard

Jump/Wall Jump - [Space]

Fall Through Platforms - S & [Space] or Down & [Space]

Pause - Esc

Abilities

Bomb - 1

Projectile - 2

Fire Towers - 3

Vortex - 4

Controller

Move - Left Analog Stick or DPad

  1. NOTE: The DPad should be used for optimal play on the WebBuild, there is a bug with the analog stick in the WebBuild Only

Attack - West Button

Jump/Wall Jump - South Button

Fall Through Platforms - Down & South Button

Pause - Start

Abilities

Bomb - Left Shoulder

Projectile - Right Shoulder

Fire - Left Trigger

Vortex - Right Trigger

Ask permission @ sasqutchbstudios@gmail.com if you want to upload this game on your own website. 

Visit our Youtube Channel for biweekly Devlog videos of our upcoming commercial game “Veil of Maia”.

______________________________________________________

Credits

Nikki Waite - Game Design, Art, SoundFX - Twitter, Itch.io, Youtube

Jonah Kay - Composed Theme Song - Twitch

There are two versions of the game. Version 1.1 includes a few bug fixes.
